content.12: Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;
content.13: Distributing to the necessity of saints; given to hospitality.
content.14: Bless them which persecute you: bless, and curse not.
content.15: Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.
content.17: Recompense to no man evil for evil. Provide things honest in the sight of all men.
content.18: If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.

content.20: Therefore if thine enemy hunger, feed him; if he thirst, give him drink: for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head.
content.21: Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good.
